channel.title: Miguel on Aggregated Thinking
channel.description: Recent content in Miguel on Aggregated Thinking

item.title: Migs in the Office!
item.description: I know about Thor’s hammer, but who or what is… E.J. - Jan 0, 2013I know about Thor’s hammer, but who or what is the Mjolnir you’re referring to?

item.title: Migs in the Office!
item.description: Miguel got real bored at home and wanted to go and meet his classmates. Since school doesn’t start until the 7th, I decided to take him with me to the office.

item.title: Civic Stories - December 2012
item.description: I sort of miss being in the backseat. A lot of my goofing off years have been conducted within the confines of the passenger doors, backside of the front seats, and the backseat.

item.title: Kids on Photobooth
item.description: Miguel and Isabel goofing off in front of the laptop. They discovered the 4-shot option and started taking pictures by themselves.

item.title: Miguel, lately.
item.description: i like the last 2 pics. kulit! haha. Connie - Dec 6, 2011i like the last 2 pics. kulit! haha.

item.title: Miguel, lately.
item.description: Since we moved apartments, the little man started doing facial expressions that always gets us wondering how he got them. I’ve tried capturing these expressions with a camera but it’s a lot harder than simply having the phone or the point-and-shoot handy at all times.

item.title: Covered area expansion project
item.description: We’ve recently decided to cover the whole area where the outdoor canteen was and turn into an activity area. I was supposed to have completed the electrical wiring last Saturday but the materials were delivered at noon and I was already quite content with just spending the afternoon with the kids.

item.title: Watching over the little one in our school's playroom.
item.description: via Gravity

item.title: Goofing off at SM.
item.description: via Gravity

item.title: Miguel does videoke
item.description: 19032011.mp4 Watch on Posterous Shot with a phone camera. Jon Miguel, who’s only a year and 11 months, trying out the videoke machine and doing some really rad facial expressions while singing.

item.title: The Time (and Miguel's dance moves)
item.description: Testing if this shows up. Jon Doblados - Jan 1, 2011Testing if this shows up.

item.title: The Time (and Miguel's dance moves)
item.description: Miguel has this rather curious dance step somewhere just before the refrain of the dance track The Time (Dirty Bit) by BEP.

item.title: Miguel coupe de cheveux, by Peter
item.description: Earlier today, we let Miguel tag along with us to David’s in Divisoria. We weren’t sure if Miguel was ready to have his first “official” haircut.

item.description: miguel1.mp4 Watch on Posterous In a month or so he’ll be too big to fit in his laundry basket. He has his eye on the bigger hamper in our room.

item.title: Miguel's first giddyap!
